original_body_lines: Education Minister Susil Premajayantha took part in the Education World Forum (2023), held annually in London, with the participation of education ministers and representatives from countries around the world.
The forum began on May 7 and will continue until May 10, with participants from 118 countries across the world.
The theme of the forum embraces "nurturing learning culture, building resilience, and promoting sustainability’ for ‘stronger, bolder, better education by design’.
